kyc-conflict.content: Your transaction could conflict with existing asset rules based on counter-party credentials.
kyc-conflict.sub-content: Are you sure you want to proceed with this transaction?
kyc-conflict.title: Please confirm your action

alert.not-completed-kyc: Receiver: {{address}} does not have the corresponding credential.
alert.not-completed-kyc-sender: Sender: {{address}} does not have the corresponding credential.

creating.content: This might take some time, please do not close the window.
creating.title: Creating wallet, please wait

phrase.content: Please write down or save the backup mnemonic phrase in a safe place. If you lose the backup mnemonic phrase, you won't be able to recover or access.
phrase.title: Backup mnemonic phrase

disclaimer-of-liability.content: Use our wallet at your own risk. We are not liable for any damages or loss of funds.
disclaimer-of-liability.title: Disclaimer of Liability

privacy.content: We handle your personal information in accordance with our privacy policy.
privacy.title: Privacy

security-measures.content: While we employ security measures, we are not liable for unauthorized access or loss of funds.
security-measures.title: Security Measures

terms.content: By creating and using our crypto wallet, you agree to comply with our terms and conditions.
terms.title: Acceptance of Terms

user-responsibility.content: You are responsible for the security and confidentiality of your wallet information.
user-responsibility.title: User Responsibility

create.read-policy-and-terms: I have read and agree to the terms and conditions.

compliance-with-laws.content: Comply with applicable laws and regulations.
compliance-with-laws.title: Compliance with Laws

modification-of-terms.content: We may modify the terms, and your continued use constitutes acceptance.
modification-of-terms.title: Modification of terms

service-availability.content: We may suspend or terminate the service without notice.
service-availability.title: Service availability

wallet-access.content: Maintain the confidentiality of your login credentials.
wallet-access.title: Wallet Access

wallet-creation.content: Provide accurate information when creating your wallet.
wallet-creation.title: Wallet Creation

create.title: Create new wallet

create-or-import: If you don't currently have a wallet, please select “$t(common:action.create)” to create a new wallet. If you already possess a wallet, please select “$t(common:action.import)”.

creating.content: It may take some time, please do not leave the window.
creating.title: Creating wallet, please wait

phrase.content: Write backup phrases down or save them to a secure place, they cannot be recovered or retrieved if you lose them.
phrase.title: Backup phrase

retirement.beneficiary-description: Text entered here will be visible on the blockchain. This is an optional field.
retirement.beneficiary-name-description: Text entered here will be visible on the blockchain. This is an optional field.
retirement.beneficiary-wallet-address-description: The Wallet address of the beneficiary to be recorded on the blockchain. Can be used by the beneficiary to prove claimed retirements for auditing purposes.
retirement.description: The Wallet address of the beneficiary to be recorded on the blockchain. Can be used by the beneficiary to prove claimed retirements for auditing purposes.

sending.memo-description: Text input into the ‘Memo’ field will be visible on the blockchain.

input.insufficient-amount: Amount entered is higher than the amount you currently hold. Please lower the amount so that it is below the number displayed in your wallet.

result.completed-description: This transaction has been submitted to the blockchain with this transaction ID. It should be confirmed within a few minutes. Until then, it will appear in your transaction history as ‘Pending’.
result.title: Transaction result
